thread.title: The Weather Channel Universal App for Windows 10 Now Available
thread.title_full: The Weather Channel Universal App for Windows 10 Now Available - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: The Weather Channel Universal App for Windows 10 Now Available
text: If the built-in Windows 10 Weather app isn't quite your cup of tea, you can always look in the store for alternatives and you'll definitely come across The Weather Channel. Starting today, The Weather Channel is available as a universal app for Windows 10, which means that it works on both PCs and mobile phones running Microsoft's operating system. Obviously, it also comes with some new features, including severe weather alerts, which issue notifications from your nation... Â»
